show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
“Matt D” from “All Addicts Anonymous,” a residential community, is my guest as we delve into the meaning and value of... <!--more--> 12-Step Programs.
  Are they applicable to all of life’s problems?
 Do psychiatric meds have any role?
  Does empathic counseling contribute anything?
 What can  everyone learn from AA principles and practices?  Can they help with psychiatric drug withdrawal?  You can also hear Matt D and dozens of other exciting presenters from around the world April 8-10 in Syracuse, NY at our Empathic Therapy Conference (www.empathictherapy.
org).
